markdownRemark.html:
This website as I wrote some days ago about DevTools Lighthouse report lacks somethings which cause low performance and SEO ratings in the report and with selecting a new color-primary for the blog and removing the default theme color from the manifest i also made some improvements in the site meta that for now is not improving the report results but may be it will in the future.

What I Learned Today

ğŸ’» Programming

  • Page Manifest.json - Updated siteâ€™s manifest.json file with theme color and added lang and description member in the manifest file.
  • Updated Tap Targets Size. Among all the issues in the report generated by Lighthoue there was this Error on â€œTap targets are sized appropriatelyâ€ and it meant that your websiteâ€™s links and button that are meant to touch to perform some action must be bigger than size of 48px48px. everythin about it explained here in detail.
  • Description Meta Tag - For now I only added Description Meta Tag for the Home page of the website but it is meant to be differnet for every page and contains a short description of the pageâ€™s content. More explained here.
